Plastic could be replaced as a primary material for packaging and product manufacturing.
The use of plastic bags would decrease significantly, leading to a reduction in plastic waste in the environment.
The recycling process would become more efficient, as plastic waste could be biodegraded and turned into other products.
The production of biodegradable plastic could create new job opportunities in the manufacturing and recycling industries.
The biodegradation of plastic could help mitigate the impact of plastic pollution on marine life and the environment.
